import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import './Filters.scss'; const Filters = props => { const {getQuery, handleChecked, specie, handleGender} = props; return (
); }; Filters.propTypes = { getQuery: PropTypes.func.isRequired, handleChecked: PropTypes.func.isRequired, specie: PropTypes.string.isRequired } export default Filters;
